title: Facebook Ads Specialist
job_overview:
About Us:
Hey! We’re Avarah’s Ink, a creative company that designs custom wall art—think amazing pet portraits and beautiful human portraits that make every home feel special. We’re all about art with heart, and we’re growing fast!

We’re looking for a Facebook Ads Specialist who knows how to get results. If you love testing new audiences, writing irresistible ad copy, and obsessing over ROAS—this could be the perfect gig for you.

Role Overview:
Creating and managing Facebook ad campaigns
Writing compelling ad copy and selecting eye-catching creatives
Targeting and retargeting the right audiences
Monitoring performance and optimizing campaigns for best results
Reporting on results and making recommendations

What We’re Looking For:
Proven experience running Facebook Ads (Meta Ads Manager)
Strong understanding of ad creative, targeting, and budgeting
Ability to test and optimize campaigns
Data-driven mindset—comfortable reading results and adjusting strategy
Proactive, creative, and adaptable

Why Join Us?
We’re passionate about what we do
We have a strong, collaborative team environment
We have other companies too—so if you’re performing well and want extra hours, there are opportunities to grow

How to Apply:
Send us an email at Upgrade to see actual info with:
Your Updated Resume
Relevant Case Studies or Examples of Campaigns You’ve Managed
